result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Knight Horton

records.addlTxt:
3:00 PM Defendant Michael J Knight Horton not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Theresa L Lewandowski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Letter regarding defendant's class schedule received prior to court. No objection by State to set for another status conference. 
Status conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's mother called looking to reschedule STC, defendant will be in classes during STC, letter mailed incorrectly to Columbia Co previously, to be forwarded to clerk. jr.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Kassidy W.
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial Judge - Br 14

8:46 AM Prosecuting attorney Thersa Louise Lewandowski in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael J Knight Horton in court. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.
Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
Status conference on October 24, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
